def_cn: 起源于…的;根源于…的;由…产生的
def_en: If you say that one thing is rooted in another, you mean that it is strongly influenced by it or has developed from it.

def_cn: （观点、感受）根深蒂固的，难以改变的
def_en: See also:deep-rooted; If someone has deeply rooted opinions or feelings, they believe or feel something extremely strongly and are unlikely to change.

def_cn: （因害怕或吃惊）呆住，不能动弹
def_en: If you are rooted to the spot, you are unable to move because you are very frightened or shocked.
